channel.title: Rules on Ace, by DAISY
channel.description: Recent content in Rules on Ace, by DAISY

item.title: HTML Rules
item.description: Under the hood, most of the accessibility checks ran by Ace are powered by aXe, an engine for automated testing of HTML. Refer to aXe’s documentation to see the complete of rules it runs.

item.title: EPUB Rules
item.description: Publication title Checks that the EPUB’s title is defined in the Package Document. Accessbility metadata Checks that schema.org accessbility metadata is defined in the Package Document. Page break source When content has page breaks, checks that the print source is identified in metadata with dc:source.
